attributes.action: Raise the personal tax free allowance in line with the raise in minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: Calculate a “real-terms neutral” allowance — the amount that would buy the same goods and services as £12,570 did in 2021. Benchmarking Against Other Metrics to tie the allowance to a transparent economic measure as well as a public consultation to measure perceived fairness and public priorities.
attributes.background: A fair investigation, An economic and fiscal impact assessment using Microsimulation models. Cost-of-Living & Inflation Adjustment Study using ONS cost-of-living indices to track how average essential expense's have risen since the freeze and a Distributional Fairness review using a decile analysis.

rejection.details:
Hello, there doesn't appear to be any direct correlation between the time for the petition and its main text.

You could start a new petition making clearer what you want - in particular, whether you want the personal income tax allowance rise in line with inflation or increases to the national living wage.
